message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to compromise and offer $8200. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go much lower than my previous offer. I'm willing to give you a small concession and offer it to you for $9100. This is as low as I can go without compromising my own interests.

I appreciate your willingness to make a small concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and offer $8800. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go much lower than my previous offer. I'm willing to make another small concession and offer it to you for $9000. This is as low as I can go without compromising my own interests.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again and offer $8600. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go much lower than my previous offer. I'm willing to make one more small concession and offer it to you for $8800. This is as low as I can go without compromising my own interests.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle one more time and offer $8500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
